title: Font search: Feng Shui font (Chinese characters) for mac
content: Hi, I am a Norwegian graphic designer in need of a Feng Shui font (mac). Have any of you come across it? I would be really grateful for answers. I found a font for PC, but that doesn't work for the project. Thanks! Marianne
author: jaxxy

comments.content: I'm not sure what you mean by a feng shui font, but if you just need the Chinese characters used in feng shui, you just need a font that supports Chinese (simplified or traditional as desired). If you need the _ba gua_ symbols, then I think many fonts include them as symbols, especially East Asian ones. Japanese fonts are a good bet. There really should be no need to get a dedicated feng shui font, whatever that is.
